about_the_game:
"As darkness falls, shadows fill with unseen foes. To arms, my soldiers! The enemy approaches through the woodland veil!"
Sir Kantal, rallying his troops in the 345th Year of the New Era

1BIT CASTLE: REMAKE invites you to the vibrant world of a pixel-art fortress under siege. In this tower defense game, strategy is your best ally as you choose from an array of heroes to defend your castle’s riches against an endless tide of monsters. With a blend of charm, challenge, and creativity, this game redefines the limits of your strategic prowess.

FEATURES:

  • Enchanting Pixel-Art Aesthetics
  • Diverse Range of Heroes
  • Vast Array of Monsters
  • A Mix of Perks System
  • Endless Mode

DEFEND THE CASTLE

Rally your troops and stand firm as waves of monstrous invaders seek to plunder your fortress’ treasures. 1BIT CASTLE: REMAKE revives the spirit of the original kantal collective’s debut game with added depth, presenting a relentless challenge that tests your tactical skills.

PICK YOUR STRATEGY

Victory requires more than just strength; it demands cunning. Choose your perks and place your troops wisely to turn the tide against the hordes of darkness. With each decision, shape the battlefield to your advantage and lead your followers to triumph!
